issue.title: [C++] subtract(date, duration) -> timestamp kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14092](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14092). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Issue to track implementation of date and duration subtraction.

Similar to ARROW-14091, the return type is timestamp if the duration contains sub-day units, and date otherwise.
